data.title: OpenAI Software Engineer Salary
data.meta_description: Software Engineer compensation in United States at OpenAI ranges from $428K per year for L3 to $875K per year for L5. The median compensation in United States package totals $810K. View the base salary, stock, and bonus breakdowns for OpenAI's total compensation packages.
data.text:
Salaries

Software Engineer

Software Engineer compensation in United States at OpenAI ranges from $428K per year for L3 to $875K per year for L5. The median compensation in United States package totals $810K. View the base salary, stock, and bonus breakdowns for OpenAI's total compensation packages. Last updated: 7/22/2024
